item.description:
This only meetup in Boston that brings together nonprofits and businesses to work on collaboration and partnerships in an informative and fun format. We will be having a short presentation followed by discussion on how it can benefit your organization. Every month we bring one local nonprofit into the spotlight and all the donations go directly to the organization. The spotlight nonprofit will be Room To Grow (http://www.roomtogrow...) for our next meetup. Vlora has also provided a special menu for the group. Look forward to seeing you there!

Agenda:

12:30-12:45pm - Networking with food and drink
12:45-1:45pm - Short introductions, monthly nonprofit spotlight presentation http://www.roomtogrow..., followed by a presentation on positivity and simple action based positivity techniques for your day-to-day life. We will then slit into three groups for deeper collaboration talks.
1:45-2+pm - More Networking and collaborating

2009 Testimonials:
http://www.youtube.co...

“I met some great people who were willing to share ideas and thoughts. Everyone wants to help - it really is a win/win situation. ” - Danielle

“A good group of experienced professionals with diversified expertise but one thing in common: enthusiasm for social changes. Clear agenda, well organized meeting. People are genuinely willing to help each other. I can see great ideas forming and real collaborations happening. ” - Jing


PS. Remember to bring your own name tag this will help brand your organization more effectively.

Sponsors of the event:

The Nonprofit Career Coach a division of Jobs In Nonprofits (http://www.thenonprof...) and Vlora Restaurant (www.vloraboston.com)
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a name tag - Bring your own name tag please!

group.name: Social Impact Success Community Meetup Group

item.name: Social Impact Circle January Meetup
